name: Vev – Digital Content Creation & Page Builder
author: Peter the Vevangelist

sections.description:
Looking for an easy way to bring interactivity and animation to your WordPress site? The official Vev plugin lets you easily integrate immersive content and entire pages built in Vev, so you can break free from the template.

WHAT IS VEV?

Vev is the only all-in-one design platform for professionals to create and launch unique web experiences with complete creative and technical freedom. Discover Vev and sign up for free.

BUILD VISUALLY WITH NO CODE

Vev lets you visually design digital content using drag-and-drop, as you would in a WordPress Page Builder, but offers complete design freedom, quality code performance, and enhanced SEO controls. Our library of pre-coded design elements an animations make it easy to bring advanced parallax effects, horizontal scrolling, forms, maps, video scrollytelling, and even 3D elements to your WordPress site.

BREAK FREE FROM YOUR TEMPLATE

Use Vev to design entire pages for your WordPress site or to create specific content components. Vev works with the Gutenberg editor and most themes to make it easy to offer premium, fully-responsive website experiences without the cost, resources, or timelines of custom coding.

PROFESSIONAL FEATURES

Vev’s true superpower is its unique design and collaboration features. Teams can work naturally and streamline production, with multiple editors and designers working in real time on the same project. Invite external collaborators into your project, share non-indexed staging links with stakeholders, and connect your favorite analytics tools in a click.
sections.installation:
Adding Vev Content as a block in the Gutenberg editor

  1. Download and activate the plugin in your WordPress Dashboard.
  2. Click “Add New” under “Pages” in your Dashboard to enter the Gutenberg editor mode.
  3. Click the plus sign (Add Block) shown in the paragraph. Search and select “Vev embed”.
  4. You are asked to paste the URL of your Vev project.
    Make sure you are logged in to Vev in either case.
  5. Click “Embed”;
    1. “Toggle on” if you want to have your block shown in full width.
      (Please note: Full width is depending on your WordPress template.)
  6. Review your edits and publish.
  7. Your Vev content is now live on your WordPress site!

Adding Vev Content as a page in the Gutenberg editor

Follow steps 1-5 as above, then:

  1. Override the Header and Footer element by clicking “Page” on the right side of the Gutenberg editor and choosing “Vev page” under Template.
  2. Review your edits and publish.
  3. Your Vev content is now live on your WordPress site!

Use the Embed code for your Vev content if you are using the Classic editor or other page builders, e.g. Elementor, Vivi, etc.

Read more about our WordPress plugin in our Help Center article.
sections.faq:
Do I need a paid Vev plan to use the plugin?

No. By signing up for a free Vev account you are able to use this plugin and serve your Vev content immediately. If you want to remove the Vev watermark (found at the bottom-right of every piece of content) you will need to sign up for a project plan or team account. Learn more about our pricing.

I’m new to Vev, how do I get started?

Well first, welcome! We built Vev with similar logic as the best design tools out there (Photoshop, Figma, xD), so it should feel very familiar and intuitive. To get started, we suggest diving right into the Design Editor and checking out our Getting Started guide.

Are Vev sites SEO friendly?

Of course! All content on Vev sites is rendered on our servers and served through SSL, so your pages will be searchable and prioritized by Google. Vev generates static well-structured HTML that search engines can easily navigate and index.

short_description: Use the official Vev plugin to easily integrate your page or content and break free from the same old templates.
